name: The Protocol Directive
summary:
Dive into the dark world of The Protocol Directive, a unique text-based adventure that blends retro charm with modern suspense. As a nameless protagonist, you begin in an ordinary office, but what seems like a normal day quickly turns into a nightmare full of decisions, secrets, and deadly challenges.

After leaving the office, you suddenly find yourself in a dark room. A light flickers on, illuminating a table with an old keyboard. Shortly after, a PC screen comes to life, and a strange force the possessed Protocol begins testing you. Every decision you make can mean the difference between life and death. Find useful (or deceptive) items, solve tricky dilemmas, and try to escape the game alive.

But nothing is as it seems. The deeper you venture into the world of the Protocol, the more reality and dream begin to blur. Is this just a cruel experiment, or are you trapped in a nightmare? Can you unravel the truth before it’s too late?

Are you ready to face the ultimate test? Choose wisely your fate is in your hands.
